name: Jail
description: A fortified site for soldiers and defense; adventurers could obtain contracts, enlist aid, or break in to free captives.
atmosphere: The jail has an oppressive, confining atmosphere with the scent of unwashed bodies and the metallic tang of iron bars. The air carries the weight of punishment and the despair of lost freedom, while the atmosphere crackles with the tension of captivity and the constant reminder of justice's harsh hand.
